identifiers: "Does not add crumb to view context when "addToViewContext" option set to false"
"route uses crumb when route.config.plugins.crumb set to true and autoGenerate set to false"
"does not validate crumb when "skip" option returns true"
"ensures crumb validation when "skip" option is not a function"
"does not set crumb cookie insecurely using https"
"does set crumb cookie if allowOrigins set and CORS enabled"
"does set crumb cookie if allowOrigins not set and CORS enabled with server.settings.cors.origin set"
"does not set crumb cookie if allowOrigins not set and CORS set to "*""
